I'm Kenechukwu (just call me Code Hermit 😁), a passionate FullStack Web Developer based in Nigeria with over 6 years of experience building scalable web applications and solving complex problems through code.

Full-Stack Developer

Nigeria 🇳🇬

Available for work

Backend Specialist

I focus on full-stack web development, specializing in backend technologies such as Node.js/Express.js with TypeScript, MongoDB, RabbitMQ, Docker, and modern cloud infrastructure. I'm passionate about building microservices architectures and API-first solutions.

Frontend Enthusiast

I have a keen interest in design and UI/UX, and I enjoy working on frontend projects using React.js, Next.js, TailwindCSS, and modern JavaScript frameworks. I believe in creating beautiful, accessible, and performant user experiences.

Problem Solver

I'm passionate about solving problems and building efficient, well-organized web solutions that are fast, high-performing, and accessible to everyone. I enjoy mentoring junior developers and contributing to open-source projects.

Beyond Code

When I'm not coding, I enjoy activities such as Gaming 🎮, watching Movies 🎞, playing Football ⚽, and staying active with fitness 🦾. I believe in maintaining a healthy work-life balance.
